nodes.name: Balanced Rings Replacer
nodes.summary: Replaces artifact rings of: Denstagmer, Phynaster, Mentor, Warlock, Wind, Khajiit, Surrounding, Vampiric - with HQ models and HQ textures (1048 px), adds glowing elements. Changes enchantings to more balanced, logical and lore friendly.

nodes.name: Articus Stronghold 2K Retexture
nodes.summary: This mod adds High Quality (2048) textures for Dunmeri Stronghold buildings. All textures are fully reworked and Lore friendly.All you need is to place conteining files to your Morrowind/Data directory.Enjoy the game and don't forget to
